price: 79. Nabiyow! barak tu xintek gamadal ugutaay, barti salat ab, barti salat fardi salaatih bagul darajaat ossantinah koh abnek, ku Rabbi Qhiyaamah ayro kaxxa shafaaqattah aracay fayla ley naharsi maraa kee ellecabö mari inkih kolle faylisal koo sooliselek.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَتَهَجَّدۡ بِهِۦ نَافِلَةٗ لَّكَ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَبۡعَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقَامٗا مَّحۡمُودٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fatahajjad bihi nāfilatan laka ʿasā an yabʿathaka rabbuka maqāman maḥmūdan
